subtitle: an insider's view of the birth of a pop culture phenomenon
title: Astro Boy and anime come to the Americas
subjects: Animated television programs -- United States -- History and criticism

description.value: " Astro Boy's popularity sparked a new industry in importing animated television to America from Japan. Fred Ladd went on to adapt other Japanese animated imports for American release, and here provides an insider's view of the creation of what has blossomed into an ongoing cultural and media phenomenon"--Provided by publisher.
